directions: Put sugar and one cup of water in a saucepan to boil
Add cranberries and return to boil 3 Lower to a simmer add apples, craisons(dried cranberries) orange and lemon juice, cinnamon and nutmeg.
Remove pan from heat and cool
ingredients:
1 cup
                            - apple chopped
 1 teaspoon
                            - cinnamon 
 16 ounces
                            - cranberries fresh
 1/2 cup
                            - crasions 
 1/2 cup
                            - lemon juice 
 1 teaspoon
                            - nutmeg 
 3/4 cup
                            - orange juice 
 1 cup
                            - walnuts chopped
 1 cup
                            - white sugar
title: Cranberry Sauce

directions: Mix two cups of water with half cup of sugar and 1/2 tablespoon salt and half cup of lard in a sauce pan.
Heat till lard melts over medium low heat.
Allow to cool to around 100 degrees.
In a separate bowl combine one half cup warm water and the yeast and 1/2 table spoon of sugar.
Add lard mixture to yeast mixuture.
Then add the six cups of flour and mix to a dough
Put the dough on a counter top and sprinkle flour over the top need for 6 to 8 minutes.
Put in mixing bowl brush melted butter on top.
Allow to sit in fridge for 8 to 16 hours.
Mold the dough into either rolls, biscuits or which ever shape you wish. Then bake at 400 degrees in a greased pan for about 15mins.
ingredients:
1 package
                            - active dry yeast 
 6 cups
                            - all purpose flour 
 1/2 cup
                            - lard 
 1/2 tablespoon
                            - salt 
 1/2 cup
                            - sugar 
 1/2 cup
                            - warm water 
 2 cups
                            - water
title: Old Fashion Fridge Rolls

directions: In a small bowl, combine the vinegar, shallot, mustard, salt, and pepper. Gradually whisk in the oil to make a creamy dressing. 2.Put all but a large handful of the spinach in a large bowl. Toss with most of the dressing. Add remaining spinach and continue tossing until well coated.
Serve immediately topped with goat cheese and walnuts.
ingredients:
8 cups
                            - baby spinach fresh
 2 whole
                            - chicken breast grilled and diced
 1/3 cup
                            - crasions 
 2 tablespoons
                            - dijon mustard 
 1/3 cup
                            - goat cheese crumbled
 1/4 tablespoon
                            - kosher salt 
 4 ounced
                            - mandarin oranges 
 1 tablespoon
                            - red wine vinegar 
 1 tablespoon
                            - shallots minced
 3 tablespoons
                            - walnut oil 
 1/2 cup
                            - walnuts chopped
title: Goat Cheese And Walnut Spinach Salad
